title: The Carriboo Jack
description:
A premier **mountain bike race** that celebrates the rugged spirit of backcountry cycling through Idaho's stunning wilderness.

**Event Highlights:**
- Multi-day backcountry mountain bike race
- **Challenging terrain** through remote wilderness areas
- Community-driven event celebrating outdoor adventure
- Self-supported racing format
- Connection with local outdoor culture

Designed for serious mountain bikers who seek adventure beyond traditional trail networks, pushing the boundaries of what's possible on two wheels in the backcountry.
shortDescription: A cult-classic, and most excellent adventure.

media.caption: Participants tackling the demanding wilderness sections of the race course

media.alt: Mountain bike race checkpoint in scenic location
media.caption: Remote checkpoint showcasing the stunning Idaho backcountry landscape
The heart of Carriboo Jack - bringing together the mountain biking community
